alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 4:50PM EDT until June 17 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 449 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scopan, or 18 miles southwest of Presque Isle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mars Hill, Easton, Bridgewater, Masardis, Scopan, Monticello, Blaine, Westfield, Scopan Lake, Number Nine Mountain and Saint Croix. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
